Reviews.Title: “Great Economy Hotel”

Reviews.Content: surprised earlier review stayed little hotel week ago low price yes bathroom clean quiet staff incredibly friendly friend check soon arrived leave bags day checked nice looking nice budget hotel location absolutely recommend hotel du college de france
